attributes.action: Clearly label every product on the shelves with the country it was made in
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make it compulsory to label every product sold in this country with the country it was made in, this will give customers the choice wether to buy a product from England or from another country. Virtually every week another company moves production abroad and another factory closes. Every product should be clearly marked with made in  England, China,Poland etc. If we want to stop loosing all our jobs abroad we need to know if a product was made in this country, so we can but british products.
